entries.description: Enhance Q inline completion context fetching for better suggestion quality
/doc: Add error message if updated README is too large
/transform: always include button to start a new transformation at the end of a job
Amazon Q can update mvn and gradle build files
Fix doc generation for modules that are a part of the project
Amazon Q /dev: Remove hard-coded limits and instead rely server-side data to communicate number of code generations remaining
/transform: automatically open pre-build error logs when available
/doc: Fix code generation error when cancelling a documentation task
Amazon Q - update messaging for /doc agent
